email_chain.subject: Inquiry: 5000MT Wheat Shipment from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear Lisa, I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 5000MT of wheat from Houston to Rotterdam on a CFR basis. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel availability for a laycan of November 10-15? Best regards, John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: 5000MT Wheat Shipment from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hi John, Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN BREEZE, with a DWT of 50,000 and LOA of 200m. The laycan is November 10-15, and the initial freight quote is USD 45/MT. Please let me know if this works for you. Best, Lisa Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: 5000MT Wheat Shipment from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hi Lisa, Thank you for the prompt response. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider lowering it to USD 40/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: 5000MT Wheat Shipment from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear John, Considering our long-standing relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 42/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day. Please confirm if this works for you. Best, Lisa Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: 5000MT Wheat Shipment from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hi Lisa, Thank you for the revised offer. We agree to the USD 42/MT rate. Please send over the contract for review. Best, John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: 5000MT Wheat Shipment from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Dear John, I am glad we could reach an agreement. I will send the contract shortly. The laycan remains November 10-15, and the demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day. Best, Lisa Smith
